message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1100000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in this product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1075000.
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to increase my offer to $1060000. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable to you.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not quite there yet. I'm willing to meet you at $1070000, but that's my final offer.
Considering our previous discussions, I am prepared to offer $1065000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise for both parties involved.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go any higher than $1075000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $1072500.
I understand your position, Alice. In light of our ongoing negotiations, I am willing to offer $1067500 for the product. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable to you.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm getting close to accepting, but I still need to get a bit closer to my target. I'm willing to meet you at $1070000, but that's my final offer.
Considering our previous discussions, I am prepared to offer $1068000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I believe it strikes a good balance between our interests.
